Onboarding.WhatIsOONIProbe.Title: 什么是 OONI Probe?
Onboarding.WhatIsOONIProbe.Paragraph:
Your app for measuring internet censorship. 

Are websites and social media apps blocked? Is your internet connection unusually slow?

Run OONI Probe to find out!
Onboarding.ThingsToKnow.Title: 小心！
Onboarding.ThingsToKnow.Bullet.1: OONI 数据会公开发布并可能包含您的网络信息。
Onboarding.ThingsToKnow.Bullet.2: Anyone monitoring your internet activity (e.g. government or ISP) will see that you are running OONI Probe.
Onboarding.ThingsToKnow.Bullet.3: You might test banned websites (but you can choose which sites to test).
Onboarding.PopQuiz.Title: 小测验
Onboarding.PopQuiz.1.Title: 问题 1/2
Onboarding.PopQuiz.1.Question: 如果有人在监控我的互联网活动，他们将会知道我在运行 OONI Probe。
Onboarding.PopQuiz.1.Wrong.Title: 警告
Onboarding.PopQuiz.1.Wrong.Paragraph: OONI Probe 不是隐私工具。任何监控您的互联网活动的人或机构都能知道您运行的软件。
Onboarding.PopQuiz.2.Title: 问题 2/2
Onboarding.PopQuiz.2.Question: 每当我运行 OONI Probe，我收集的网络数据都将会被自动发布。
Onboarding.PopQuiz.2.Wrong.Title: 警告
Onboarding.PopQuiz.2.Wrong.Paragraph: To increase transparency of internet censorship, the network data of all OONI Probe users is automatically published (unless they opt-out in the settings).
Onboarding.DefaultSettings.Title: 默认设置
Onboarding.DefaultSettings.Bullet.1: 国家代码（例如，IT 指代意大利）
Onboarding.DefaultSettings.Paragraph:
We do our best not to publish your IP address or any other potentially personally-identifiable information.

Learn more through [OONI's Data Policy](https://ooni.io/about/data-policy/).
Dashboard.Tab.Label: 面板
Dashboard.Card.Subtitle: 触击选项卡以查看详情
Dashboard.Websites.Overview.Paragraph:
Check whether websites are blocked using OONI's [Web Connectivity test](https://ooni.io/nettest/web-connectivity/).

Every time you tap Run, you test different websites from the Citizen Lab's [global](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) and [country-specific](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists) test lists.

To test the sites of your choice, tap the Choose websites button or select categories of sites via the settings of this card. 

This test measures whether websites are blocked by means of DNS tampering, TCP/IP blocking or by a transparent HTTP proxy.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.io/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
Dashboard.Performance.Card.Description: 测试您的网络速度和性能
Dashboard.Performance.Overview.Paragraph:
Measure the speed and performance of your network using the [NDT](https://ooni.io/nettest/ndt/) test.

Measure video streaming performance using the [DASH](https://ooni.io/nettest/dash/) test.

These tests consume data depending on your network speed.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.io/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).

Disclaimer: These tests rely on third party servers. We therefore cannot guarantee that your IP address will not be collected.
Dashboard.Middleboxes.Overview.Paragraph:
Internet Service Providers often use network appliances (middleboxes) for various networking purposes (such as caching). Sometimes these middleboxes are used to implement internet censorship and/or surveillance.

Find middleboxes in your network using OONI's [HTTP Invalid Request Line](https://ooni.io/nettest/http-invalid-request-line/) and [HTTP Header Field Manipulation](https://ooni.io/nettest/http-header-field-manipulation/) tests.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.io/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
Dashboard.InstantMessaging.Card.Descript: 测试封锁即时消息应用的情况
Dashboard.InstantMessaging.Overview.Para:
Check whether [WhatsApp](https://ooni.io/nettest/whatsapp/), [Facebook Messenger](https://ooni.io/nettest/facebook-messenger/) and [Telegram](https://ooni.ionettest/telegram/) are blocked.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.io/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
TestResults.Overview.Title: 测试结果
TestResults.Overview.Tab.Label: 测试结果
TestResults.Overview.NoTestsHaveBeenRun: 还没有进行过测试。试着运行一个吧！
TestResults.Details.Websites.LikelyBlock:
{WebsiteURL} is likely blocked by means of {BlockingReason}.

Note: False positives can occur. Learn more [here](https://ooni.io/nettest/web-connectivity/).
TestResults.Details.InstantMessaging.Wha: This test successfully connected to WhatsApp's endpoints, registration service and web interface (web.whatsapp.com).
TestResults.Details.InstantMessaging.Tel: This test successfully connected to Telegram's endpoints and web interface (web.telegram.org).
TestResults.Details.InstantMessaging.Fac: This test successfully connected to Facebook's endpoints and resolved to Facebook IP addresses.
TestResults.Details.Middleboxes.HTTPInva: No network anomaly was detected when communicating with our servers.

Network traffic was manipulated when contacting our control servers.

This means that there may be a middlebox in your network, which could be responsible for censorship and/or surveillance.
TestResults.Details.Middleboxes.HTTPHead: No network anomaly was detected when communicating with our servers.

Network traffic was manipulated when contacting our control servers.

This means that there may be a middlebox in your network, which could be responsible for censorship and/or surveillance.
TestResults.Details.Performance.Dash.Vid: You can stream up to {VideoQuality} without buffering.

Feed.Title: Feed
Modal.Error.NoInternet: Unable to run the test. Please check your internet connectivity.
Modal.Error.CantDownloadURLs: Unable to download URL list. Please try again.
Modal.Error.NotificationNotEnabled: Notification permissions are required. Please enable them in the Settings of your phone and then enable them in your OONI Probe app.
Modal.Error.CantCloseScreen: This screen is locked while a test is running.
Modal.ResultsNotUploaded.Title: Results not uploaded
Modal.ResultsNotUploaded.Paragraph: Some of your test results have not been uploaded to OONI servers. If you'd like to contribute to OONI's dataset, please upload them.
Modal.EnableNotifications.AutomatedTesti: Enable notification permissions to run tests automatically.
Modal.EnableNotifications.News: Enable notification permissions to receive news updates.
Modal.EnableNotifications.Any: Enable notification permissions to receive push notifications.
Modal.EnableGPS: To improve the accuracy of tests, we need GPS permissions. OONI will only collect an approximation of your GPS position.
Modal.OldTestsDetected: The old results will be deleted. Don't worry, you can always find them in OONI Explorer and in the OONI API.
Modal.DoYouWantToDeleteAllTests: 您要删除所有测试结果吗？

Settings.Title: 设置
Settings.Error.TestDurationTooLow: The amount of time you have set for the test duration is too low.
Settings.About.Label: 关于 OONI
Settings.About.Content.Paragraph:
The Open Observatory of Network Interference (OONI) is a free software project under The Tor Project that aims to increase transparency of internet censorship around the world.

Since 2012, OONI's global community has been measuring networks in more than 200 countries. Some of these measurements serve as evidence of internet censorship.
Settings.Notifications.Label: 通知
Settings.AutomatedTesting.Label: Regular test reminder
Settings.Sharing.Label: 分享
Settings.Sharing.IncludeCountryCode.PopU: This information (e.g. IT for Italy) is required to identify which country the measurements are collected from. Are you sure you want to disable this option?
Settings.Sharing.Footer:
By publishing results, you are increasing transparency of network interference and supporting the OONI community. 

Network information (i.e. Autonomous System Number) is required for identifying Internet Service Providers.
Settings.Advanced.Label: 高级
Settings.Websites.Categories.Label: Website categories to test
Settings.Websites.CustomURL.Title: Choose websites to test
Settings.Middleboxes.TestHTTPInvalidRequ: 运行 HTTP Invalid Request Line 测试
Settings.Middleboxes.TestHTTPHeaderField: 运行 HTTP Header Field Manipulation 测试
